title: Ex-Rocket, Magic assistant Mario Elie happy to be back coaching in NBA

Published By: Houston Chronicle Sports - Today 
Magic assistant coach and former former Rockets forward Mario Elie cheerfully coached against the team from his adopted hometown on Sunday w...
